info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 29 at 6:17AM CDT until July 1 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield MO
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...
Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County.
For the Big Piney River...including Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate... Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate.
* WHEN...From late tonight to early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, the Happy Hollow Picnic Area floods.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 3.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 9.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.6 feet on 12/01/2006. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 630 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING
